text: Arcen is a village in the Dutch province of Limburg. Since 2010 Arcen is part of the municipality of Venlo. ==Climate== The highest temperature ever recorded in Arcen was on 25 July 2019. https://www.wetterzentrale.de/extremes_y.php?station=391&country;=3ℴ=1&extreem;=X_TX The lowest temperature ever recorded in Arcen was on 2 January 1997. https://www.wetterzentrale.de/extremes_y.php?station=391&country;=3ℴ=2&extreem;=X_TN ==Sights== * Castle and Castle Gardens https://www.limburgs- landschap.nl/natuurgebied/kasteel-arcen-en-kasteeltuinen/ * Petrus and Paulus Church https://www.kerkgebouwen-in-limburg.nl/kerken/arcen/petrus-en-paulus * Former town hall https://www.mooistedorpjes.nl/nederland/limburg/arcen/ ==References== Category:Settlements in Limburg (Netherlands) Category:Venlo
title: Arcen
